results.name: E.g.f.: exp( x * exp(-x) ).
reference: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..557
formula: First column of A215652. - _Peter Bala_, Sep 14 2012
G.f.: Sum_{k>=0} x^k/(1 + k*x)^(k+1). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jun 25 2018
program: (PARI) Vec(serlaplace(exp(exp(-x) * x))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 26 2017
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_
